rows.label: qst720202_msg0001
rows.name:
â€”So, did you find that
uninhabited Divine Beast?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0002
rows.name: Yes, I reached it safely.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0003
rows.name:
The phantom map,
the bard's song, the old folktales...
every last one was true.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0004
rows.name:
Geez, if you were going to have a fun
adventure like that, you could have
waited until after you bonded with me.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0005
rows.name:
There's no way I could have known
back then that I'd end up as
the Driver of the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0006
rows.name:
Especially a Blade as full
of curiosity as this one.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0007
rows.name: At least I'm not boring, right?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0008
rows.name: I suppose...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0009
rows.name:
But I wasn't bored when
I reached the legendary
uninhabited Divine Beast, either.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0010
rows.name:
I mean, the natives chased me
all over the place.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0011
rows.name:
There were natives?
But I thought you said
it was uninhabited.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0012
rows.name: It was just uninhabited by humans.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0013
rows.name:
It was a paradise of
Spiders, Antols, and Skeeters.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0014
rows.name: Whoa...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0015
rows.name:
And every last one of them was huge.
I must have looked like a tasty
snack to them.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0016
rows.name:
I was chased all over the place
and barely escaped from the
Divine Beast with my life.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0017
rows.name:
Good grief.
So that was the result
of your grand adventure?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0018
rows.name:
So the plan to make it Prince Adel's
private villa fell through.
What a shame.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0019
rows.name:
Hey, hey,
I never planned anything
like that in the first place.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0020
rows.name:
An adventure's rewards aren't just
material. The spiritual rewards
are important, too.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0021
rows.name:
Although, I guess my competitors
didn't see it that way.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0022
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0023
rows.name:
I heard later that the insect paradise
was burned to the ground by humans.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0024
rows.name: That's a terrible story...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0025
rows.name:
It couldn't be helped.
Apparently, they needed a place
for refugees fleeing the war.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0026
rows.name:
But to the monsters,
it was probably just selfish
human reasoning.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0027
rows.name: That's hard to hear.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0028
rows.name:
Your Majesty,
forgive me for interrupting.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0029
rows.name:
That looks like the location
from the report.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0030
rows.name: Oh, we're here already?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0031
rows.name:
The time just flew by
listening to Adel's story.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0032
rows.name:
I am overjoyed that I could
relieve my master's boredom.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0033
rows.name:
Please, stop.
I'm not worthy of
standing above you, Adel.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0034
rows.name: I wouldn't say that...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0035
rows.name:
So, what's your take, Hikari?
As a Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0037
rows.name:
Sorry, but this is a dead end.
This wasn't Metsu.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0038
rows.name: What makes you say that?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0039
rows.name:
His attacks would have melted
the ground and vitrified the soil.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0040
rows.name:
Here, the grass is just charred.
It was a much lower-temperature fire.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0041
rows.name:
I see. That's a precise analysis.
It was good of you to come.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0042
rows.name: I apologize for the wasted effort.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0043
rows.name:
It's alright.
Just knowing this was
a false lead is progress.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0044
rows.name:
If we crush the possibilities one by
one, we will eventually reach our goal.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0045
rows.name: Everyone, look over there.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0046
rows.name: That's a big one.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0047
rows.name: Right. We can't just leave it alone.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0048
rows.name:
Yeah. If it shows up in a village or
Lasqam Harbor, it'll be a catastrophe.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0049
rows.name: Alright everyone, let's go!
